data.title: Maria Schell
data.text:
AKA Margarete Schell

Born: 15-Jan-1926

Birthplace: Vienna, Austria

Died: 26-Apr-2005

Location of death: Preitenegg, Carinthia, Austria

Cause of death: Pneumonia

Remains: Buried, Ortsfriedhof, Preitenegg, Austria

Gender: Female

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: Austria

Executive summary: The Heart of the Matter

Father: Ferdinand Hermann Schell

Mother: Margarethe Noe von Nordberg

Brother: Carl Schell (b. 14-Nov-1927)

Brother: Maximilian Schell (actor, b. 8-Dec-1930)

Sister: Immy Schell (b. 11-Feb-1935)

Husband: Horst Hächler (m. 1957, div. 1965, one son)

Son: Oliver Hächler ("Oliver Schell")

Husband: Veit Relin (m. 1966, div. 1988, one daughter)

Daughter: Marie-Theres Relin (b. 1966)

FILMOGRAPHY AS ACTOR

Nineteen Nineteen (Feb-1985)

Samson and Delilah (1-Apr-1984)

Inside the Third Reich (9-May-1982)

La passante du sans-souci (14-Apr-1982)

The Martian Chronicles (27-Jan-1980)

Christmas Lilies of the Field (16-Dec-1979)

Superman (15-Dec-1978) · Vond-Ah

Just a Gigolo (16-Nov-1978)

Voyage of the Damned (22-Dec-1976)

The Twist (23-Jun-1976)

The Odessa File (18-Oct-1974)

The Bloody Judge (5-Feb-1970) · Mother Rosa

The Devil by the Tail (29-Jun-1969) · Diane

99 Women (14-Mar-1969)

The Mark (8-Jun-1961)

Cimarron (16-Feb-1961) · Sabra Cravat

The Hanging Tree (11-Feb-1959) · Elizabeth Mahler

Une vie (24-Sep-1958)

The Brothers Karamazov (20-Feb-1958) · Grushenka

White Nights (6-Sep-1957)

Gervaise (3-Aug-1956)

The Rats (6-Jul-1955)

Napoléon (25-Mar-1955)

The Heart of the Matter (3-Nov-1953) · Helen Rolt

The Magic Box (1951)
